tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT NOT NULL,
  tracking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  altitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_positions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data ( 
    satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    latitude FLOAT, 
    longitude FLOAT, 
    altitude FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_status ( 
    satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    status VARCHAR(50), 
    last_communication TIMESTAMP, 
    battery_level FLOAT, 
    is_active BOOLEAN 
);

CREATE TABLE TrackingData (
  tracking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  elevation DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_satellite FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES Satellite(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DataAnalysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  tracking_id INT NOT NULL,
  station_id INT NOT NULL,
  analysis_result TEXT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_tracking FOREIGN KEY (tracking_id) REFERENCES TrackingData(tracking_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_station FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES GroundStation(station_id)
);
